column5: Hey All:  Heading up to Port Loring mid July and was looking for some help..  Has anyone stayed up there or been to the town,  is there an internet cafe or cell phone coverage?  Does anyone have a chart of Caribou lake or a rough chart. It would save me some time driving around  Any help or good information you can provide would be great.  Thanks  Lexx

Not sure where you are staying but I have fished here several years ago. Nice gut give him a call.  http://www.brookscottages.com/index.html  Caught Pickeral and Lakers.  Reef just up from these cottages marked with a bouy. Jigged it in the evening and got a nice pickerel.
My family has booked a cottage just around the corner from there,  Thanks for the info that web site game me lots of information too.
